From Wasagaming, follow Highway 10 north to Highway 19.  Go east on Highway 19, and turn right on the road to Lake Katherine.  Just before the boat launch, turn left and proceed to the parking area. The rest of the trail is splendid.

In theory, this is a loop trail, but on our visit, the return portion of the trail was entirely underwater. There appeared to be a rough trail to the right just before reaching the lake, but this does not last long.  If the water level is lower, you may be able to follow the return portion of the trail to return to the parking lot.  Otherwise, turn around and retrace your steps to where you started.
